body_html:
I'm confused.

@nolanliou wrote:

My solution:

  • add required argument to the DEFINE_* APIs. which can solve the problem of lacking some required args or typo.

  • add warning information for unparsed arguments.

As far as I see only the first point has been implemented, which is to allow for required flags. I do not see where their second point has been implemented, which in my view is what the original feature request asks for. Am I missing something?

body:
I'm confused.

@nolanliou wrote:
> My solution:
> 
> - add required argument to the DEFINE_* APIs. which can solve the problem of lacking some required args or typo.
>
> - add warning information for unparsed arguments.

As far as I see only the first point has been implemented, which is to allow for required flags. I do not see where their second point has been implemented, which in my view is what the original feature request asks for. Am I missing something?
